title: The Monster Slayer - Sound Effect Bundle
description: With this bundle you'll get more than 2000 sound effects and 8 packs!
longDescription:
Hello Developer!


Introduction

This asset contains more than 1000 new and exclusive sound effects, plus 7 audio libraries, in total you will acquire more than 2000 files for moments when you need to slay a creature!


Preview: The Monster Slayer - Sound Effect Bundle - YouTube

Documentation: Here


Check the Other Packages Included in the bundle

  • Combat Magic Spells - Sound Effect
  • Monster Sounds - Sound Effects
  • PHYSICAL COMBAT - SOUND EFFECTS
  • Whooshs, Swooshs & Swishs - Sound Effects
  • Enemy Sounds - Sound Effects

+2 Exclusive Audio Libraries

  • Fire Elements (211 Files)
  • Human Voices (86 Files)


Exclusivities:

To create this i used sounds that i'm recording for more than one year out of the most random objects and noises i could found, when i was creating this package i realize that most creatures do some sounds but the real sounds is a skill/ a magic/ or even the sound of the monster being hit, so this is not just voices/roar/screams and stuff like that, but also sounds that you can use for magic, combat, gore, and stuff like that.


Variety:

You'll have the pack CombatMagicSpells that you can use for magical creatures and skills, the pack EnemySounds with alot of common sounds for creatures around games, the pack FireElements that you can use for fire creatures and fire situations, the pack HumanVoices that you can edit to create hundreds of monster creatures, the pack MonsterSounds wich contain mainly roars/and screams of creatures, the pack PhysicalCombat wich is a audio librarie with sounds of iron/swords/axes/ and stuff like that, the pack WhooshsSwooshsSwishs that you can use for a lot of movements of creatures.


Ease:

The sounds are really easy to use, you can check all of them in action in the preview.


Helping each other:

When you invest in this package, in addition to taking all the aforementioned things, you still help me and motivate me to continue creating new materials for developers


Important point:

* Any questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email, thank you!

* The cover illustrations are in the public domain distributed by oldbookillustrations the artist of the illustrations are Rhead, George Woolliscroft

* the background music is from: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=azBtX...


License:

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim/resell as your own work.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 2404

Number of Audio Cues: 2404

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100Hz

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The one that does contains 'loop' on it's name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation
